attributes.action: fly influential leaders to the edge of space
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Astronauts looking down on Earth from space have long said the Earth looks fragile. We believe that influential leaders should experience this for themselves. This could lead to better understanding between nations, less potential for war and greater sharing of resources.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
